content.en: Kaohsiung Harbor has many things to see. It has big ships! They carry many things to and from Taiwan. It has ferryboats! They take visitors around the harbor. And sometimes it has races!
content.tw: 高雄港有很多船隻運送貨物，也有渡輪可以帶遊客繞港口，有時候還會辦比賽!

content.en: Many people came to watch one race. They watched from the harbor. And they watched from the Great Harbor Bridge! People wore yellow hats with... duck faces? Huh!
content.tw: 很多人為了看一場比賽，擠滿高雄港跟大港橋，而且大家都戴著黃色小鴨的帽子。

content.en: The race was three hundred fifty meters long! Who was in the race? Fifteen thousand yellow rubber ducks were!
content.tw: 這場比賽全長350公尺，是誰要比賽呢? 是1萬5千隻的橡皮小鴨。

content.en: Do you like rubber ducks? They're small and cute. They float on water. So these fifteen thousand yellow rubber ducks floated. They didn't race.
content.tw: 你喜歡橡皮小鴨嗎?它們又小又可愛。它們會浮在水上但不會比賽。

content.en: Some people got on boats! They sprayed the ducks with water! The ducks moved! People cheered! Go, duckies, go!
content.tw: 船上有一些人對著小鴨灑水，讓它們往前移動。

content.en: Each duck had a number on it. People also had a number. Fifty ducks won big prizes! Fifty people with those ducks' numbers got the prizes!
content.tw: 小鴨身上有號碼，民眾手上也有號碼。對應到前50名小鴨的號碼就可以得到獎品。

content.en: Then the ducks were cleaned. Fifteen thousand lucky kids got a duck! Maybe they'll play with their ducks in the bath! Go, duckie, go!
content.tw: 接著小鴨被清洗乾淨。一萬五千個幸運的孩子得到了一隻小鴨！也許他們會帶著他們的小鴨在浴缸裡玩！小鴨，衝啊，衝啊！

vocabulary.preface: 小黃鴨的比賽，其實是人用噴水的方式讓它們前進。

content.text: 1. yellow 黃色的 I'm going to Kaohsiung this weekend. 我這周末要去高雄。 To see the yellow duck in the harbor, right? 去看港口的黃色鴨鴨，對吧? I wish.我真希望是。
2. float 漂浮 But it's not there anymore. 但是它已經不在那裏了。 Oh, no! I haven't seen it yet.糟糕，我還沒看呢! I sure like the sight of a giant yellow duck floating on water. 我真喜歡胖大黃鴨鴨浮在水上的樣子。
3. cute 可愛的 I know. Isn't it cute? 我懂啊，可不是很可愛嘛? That duck always makes me smile. 那隻鴨子總會讓我微笑。
4. bath 洗澡 I think it reminds people of taking a bath. 我猜它讓人想到洗澡。 Yeah, my son loves playing with the ducks in the bathtub. 我兒子就很喜歡在澡盆裡跟小鴨鴨玩。

vocabulary.postscript: 來一起讀單字。 yellow黃色的 float漂浮 cute可愛的 bath洗澡

title: Telescope Finds An Old, Old Galaxy

content.en: Tomorrow is Star Wars Day! So here's a story about a galaxy far, far away…
Telescopes let us see things that are very far away. We can see the moon, stars, and planets. The bigger the telescope is, the more we can see.
content.tw: 望遠鏡可以讓我們看到很遠的東西，像是月球、恆星、還有行星。望遠鏡越大，看得越遠。

content.en: The James Webb Telescope is the biggest telescope in space today. It goes around and around the sun. It takes pictures. Then it sends them to Earth. Scientists study the pictures.
content.tw: 詹姆士．韋伯望遠鏡是現今最大的太空望遠鏡。它環繞太陽拍照，再傳回地球給科學家研究。

content.en: This telescope takes many cool pictures! It took pictures that show how stars are made. It also took pictures of a small galaxy. Scientists say this galaxy is the oldest we have seen. They say it made between one hundred million stars... and one billion stars!
content.tw: 它拍了很多很酷的照片，讓人看到星星是怎麼形成的，也拍到人類到現在為止看過的最古老的銀河，這個銀河產生了有高達一億到十億個星星。

content.en: This galaxy died thirteen billion years ago! That means it stopped making stars then.
content.tw: 但這個銀河在130億年前就不再形成新的星球了。

content.en: Telescopes let us see new things far, far away in space! Who knows what pictures the Webb Telescope will send next? Have a great Star Wars Day tomorrow… Tomorrow is May the fourth. It's a good day to say "May the force be with you!"
content.tw: 望遠鏡讓我們看到太空深處遙遠的新事物！誰知道韋伯望遠鏡接下來會傳送什麼照片呢？祝你明天有個愉快的星際大戰日…明天是五月四日。這是個說「願原力與你同在！」的好日子。

vocabulary.preface: 韋伯太空望遠鏡拍攝的照片，大大增加科學家對太空的了解。

content.text:
1. million 百萬
Wow, check out this cluster of stars! 哇，你看這一群星星!
It's like they're having a party there! 他們好像在那兒開派對!
Let me see it. 讓我看看。
Yeah, there must be millions of stars there! 對啊，那裏一定有好幾百萬顆星星。

2. billion 十億
No, way more than that. 不對，比那個多很多。
I would say billions of them. 我想有好幾十億顆。

3. go around 環繞
Do you think they all go around one center? 你覺得星星都繞著一個中心轉嗎?
That's a good question. 好問題。

picture 照片、圖片
Google says they do. 谷歌說是那樣沒錯。
We can find some pictures to prove that. 我們可以找到一些照片來證明這一點。

billion十億
